testCase.name: TodoController.deleteTodo should have a deleteTodo function
TodoController.deleteTodo should return 200 ok and deleted todomodel
TodoController.updateTodo should return a response with json data and http code 200
TodoController.updateTodo should return 404 when item doesnt exist
TodoController.getTodoById should call TodoModel.findById with route parameters
TodoController.getTodoById should return json body and response code 200
TodoController.getTodoById should return 404 when item doesn't exist
TodoController.getTodos should have a getTodos function
TodoController.getTodos should return response with status 200 and all todos
TodoController.createTodo should have a createTodo function
TodoController.createTodo should return json body in response
